By signing up for CreatED 2018 you agree to abide by the Major League Hacking Code of Conduct.


We participate in Major League Hacking (MLH) as a MLH Localhost Event. You authorize us to share certain application/registration information for event administration, ranking, MLH administration, pre and post-event informational e-mails, and occasional messages about hackathons in line with the MLH Privacy Policy.
